# Hurling, Greater (Ex)
## Overview
*Hurling, Greater (Ex)*: As [[Hurling (Ex)|hurling]], but the barbarian can increase the range increment to 30 feet or increase the size of a hurled object by two size categories. A barbarian must have the [[Hurling (Ex)|hurling]] rage power to select this rage power. A barbarian must be at least 12th level to select this rage power.

**Source:** Advanced Player's Guide, pg. 76
